        @Et(value="Je change la valeur et je sauvegarde dans la cl\u00e9 {string} du contexte:")

public void changeValue(String targetKey,
                                                                                                                                                                                   Map<String,String> params)
                                                                                                                                                                            throws FailureException
        Parameters:
        targetKey - is target key for the context.
        params - contains format ("Integer" by default) and the list of possible operator (plus, minus, multiplies, divides)
